page.description: Used in a Web application to save data to the Web Application Repository.
page.syntax: L Result = a5w_SaveToWebAppRepository(C key ,C Data [,C objectType [,C componentGuid [,C userId [,C securityGroups [,* pResultIn ]]]]])

argument.name: key
argument.description: Key value of the data you are saving. This is how data are retrieved from the repository. Must be a unique value. Limit 40 characters.

argument.name: Data
argument.description: The data to save in the repository. Must be character data. No length limit

argument.name: objectType
argument.description: (optional) A description of the type of data; the description can be determined by the user

argument.name: componentGuid
argument.description: (optional) The GUID of the component from where the data was saved

argument.name: userId
argument.description: (optional) The userId of the user who saved the data in the repository

page.discussion: Used in a Web application to save data to the Web Application Repository. Returns .t. if the data was saved, or .f. if it was not saved.

see.ref: Web Projects Control Panel Enhancements V11
